secret_rule: Only items that have been mentioned or referenced in renowned Mythologies from around the world can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Ambrosia" and "Mjolnir".

Correct! The rule is: Only items that have been mentioned or referenced in renowned Mythologies from around the world can be brought to the picnic.
